branches.title: The Necromancer
branches.description: You sense a foul presence nearby as the dead stir unnaturally. A hooded figure chants among the corpses - step closer and confront the necromancer.

branches.title: The Cursed Crown
branches.description: An ominous crown rests on a stone altar, whispering promises of power. Reach out and claim the crown, despite the curse that clings to it.
